name: dust collector production, electrostatic precipitator, for domestic use | dust collector, electrostatic precipitator, for domestic use | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1509/documentation

This dataset represent the production and the disposal of an electrostatic precipitator for domestic use, dimensioned to be connected to a stove or furnaces for residential wood combustion (with thermal capacity less than 35kW). Its air flow capacity is 1.4 liters per second.

From reception of furnace components at the factory gate

This activity ends with the disposal of the device in the end of its lifetime.The dataset includes includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of a particle separator (electrostatic precipitator, ESP) to be applied in residential wood combustiondevices: stainless steel, nylon, copper, electronic control. The dataset includes electricity for the construction and the disposal of the device.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2819:Manufacture of other general-purpose machinery

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Particle separator for kindling fires. Model of reference developed by Ruegg Cheminee (Switzerland) in co-operation with EMPA (Swiss material testing institute). Model: Zumikron
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: literature, personal communications from technicians and producers, technical data available
